name: Lost Civilizations: The Indus Valley
description: The application is an open world recreation of the city of Mohenjo-daro during the peak of the Indus Valley Civilization (2600 BCE - 1900 BCE). Players can move about in the world by foot. The open world covers the city of Mohenjo-daro upto the banks of the Indus. There are several knowledge points where information about the IVC pops up. The application is intended to be used as a teaching tool in educational institutions and for students to engage in an immersive learning experience.
